PyXMPP
Package pyxmpp :: Package jabber :: Module vcard :: Class VCardJID
[hide private]

Class VCardJID

source code

VCardField --+
             |
            VCardJID

JID vCard field.

This field is not defined in RFC 2426, so it will be named 'x-jabberid' in RFC 2425 output.
